K10bsu026_u:3: ekasmin samaye bhagavān trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ madhye viharati sma pāṇḍukambalakalpe
K10bsu026_u:7: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ utthāyāsanāt ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā
K10bsu026_u:8: dakṣiṇaṃ jānuṃ merupṛṣṭhe 'vaṣṭabhya yena bhaganān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat
K10bsu026_u:9: - ete hi bhagavan devāḥ caityanamaskriyāmaṇḍanāḥ etatpariṣanmaṇḍalapatitāḥ kathamapi
K10bsu026_u:10: brahmacaryapuṇyaprasavāḥ sadevake samārake sabrahmake loke saśramaṇabrāhmaṇaprajāsu
K10bsu026_u:11: bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaḥ upāsakopāsikāḥ subahulapuṇyaprasavāḥ bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ yācante iti /
K10bsu026_u:13: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
K10bsu026_u:14: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
K10bsu026_u:18: yaśca avalokiteśvara kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā śraddhāsamanvitaḥ apratiṣṭhite pṛthivīpradeśe
K10bsu026_u:19: āmalakamātraṃ caityaṃ sūcīmātraṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ bakulapuṣpamātraṃ chatraṃ kṛtvā pratītyasamutpādadharmadhātugāthāṃ paṭhati,
K10bsu026_u:21: itaḥ pracyāvya maraṇakālaṃ kṛtvā brahmaloke utpadyate /
K10bsu026_u:22: tataḥ pracyāvya kālaṃ kṛtvā śuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmutpadyate //
